short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily search products on aliexpress by image. List site support: amazon, ebay and etsy.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AliExpress Search by Image  is small extention help you search product on aliexpress.com by image from amazon , ebay , etsy.

AliExpress Search by Image  helps to find similar products on aliexpress.com most accurately and with the best product price . Just right click on product image and choose “Search product in Aliexpress”.
 
Typical user cases:
•	Show similar products
•	Discover visually relevant products to find the best deals


User guide to use:
1.	Open product lists on amazon , ebay , etsy.
2.	Right Click on product image
3.	Choose “Search product in Aliexpress.com”


Email support bravoapp46@gmail.com
